original_definition: 'hybrid vacuum cleaner' means a vacuum cleaner that can be powered by both electric mains and batteries;
generated_definition: NO JSON AS AN OUTPUT OBTAINED

Article 1: 1.   This Regulation establishes eco-design requirements for the placing on the market of electric mains-operated vacuum cleaners, including hybrid vacuum cleaners.
1.   This Regulation establishes eco-design requirements for the placing on the market of electric mains-operatedvacuum cleaners, includinghybrid vacuum cleaners.
Article 2: ‘hybrid vacuum cleaner’ means a vacuum cleaner that can be powered by both electric mains and batteries;
Article 9: Forhybrid vacuum cleaners all measurements shall be executed with the vacuum cleaner powered by the electric mains and anybattery operated active nozzle only.
For hybrid vacuum cleaners all measurements shall be executed with the vacuum cleaner powered by the electric mains and any battery operated active nozzle only.
